name: swap
description: Swap tokens from one token to another on any chain

toToken.description: The token address to swap to

fromToken.description: The token address to swap from

amount.description: The amount of tokens to swap

name: send
description: Send single or multiple token transfers in a single transaction. Accepts an array of token transfers.

transfers.description: Array of token transfers to execute

toAddress.description: The recipient address to send tokens to

amount.description: The amount of token to send
